cosmoassailants.Gamelogic

Interface Enemy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EnemyAssailant

    public interface Enemy
    Interface class for enemies

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean allowedToMove()
      Checks how often the enemy is allowed to move, returns true if enemy has been stationary for sufficient number of frame updates.
      boolean enemyCanShoot()
      creates a random number and compares it to enemyShotChance, if random number is smaller returns true and enemy can shoot.
      int getLocationX() 
      int getLocationY() 
      void hasDied()
      Sets enemy status to dead
      boolean isAlive()
      Returns enemy status.
      void move()
      Moves the enemy
      void setMoveSpeed(int s)
      Changes how many frame refreshes the enemy must remain stationary after every move

    • Method Detail

      • getLocationX

        int getLocationX()

      • getLocationY

        int getLocationY()

      • move

        void move()
        Moves the enemy

      • isAlive

        boolean isAlive()
        Returns enemy status.
        Returns:
        boolean whether enemy is alive

      • hasDied

        void hasDied()
        Sets enemy status to dead

      • setMoveSpeed

        void setMoveSpeed(int s)
        Changes how many frame refreshes the enemy must remain stationary after every move
        Parameters:
        s - how many frames the enemy should wait until moving

      • enemyCanShoot

        boolean enemyCanShoot()
        creates a random number and compares it to enemyShotChance, if random number is smaller returns true and enemy can shoot.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • allowedToMove

        boolean allowedToMove()
        Checks how often the enemy is allowed to move, returns true if enemy has been stationary for sufficient number of frame updates.
        Returns:
        boolean
